alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Clay; Gregory; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 9:02PM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Gregory, Charles Mix, Bon Homme, Yankton and Clay Counties. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 AM CDT Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 7 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated stronger winds are possible near any thunderstorms tonight. The strong winds will also lead to elevated fire danger, especially on Saturday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Clay; Gregory; Yankton
